idinfo.useconst:
NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program policies. THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program for its own internal business purposes. The Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, the GIS Data must include a copy of this disclaimer.
The Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program shall have no liability for any claim of infringement or rights by third parties based on any use of the Licensed Dataset in compination with programs, software, hardware, or equipment not designated by the WPC, without prior written approval by Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program, if such infringement could have been avoided had the Licensed Dataset not been so used.
While Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program warrants that the data in the Licensed Dataset has been reviewed to ensure compliance with quality control standards, WPC shall have no liability or responsibility to the data users, or any other person or entity with respect to any liability, loss, or damage caused or alleged to be caused directly or indirectly by the Licensed Dataset, including but not limited to any interruption of service, loss of business, anticipatory profits or indirect, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or operation of the Licensed Dataset.

cntorgp.cntorg: Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program (Western Pennsylvania Conservancy)

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

citeinfo.title: Pennsylvania Aquatic Database
citeinfo.othercit: All sites were compiled from a number of datasources which can be found in the "source" table of the PAD.

procstep.procdesc: All sites with Latitude and Longitude values in the PAD were exported as a dbf and opened as an event theme, and then saved as this shape file.

enttyp.enttypd: all aquatic sampling sites from the Pennsylvania Aquatic Database (PAD) at the completion of Phase I of the Pennsylvania Aquatic Community Classification project that had no datarelease restrictions

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Unique station ID for each sampling site in the PAD.
Were fish sampled at this site?

edom.edomvd: Fish were sampled at this site.
Fish were not sampled at this site

attr.attrdef: Were benthic macroinvertebrates sampled at this site?

edom.edomvd: benthic macroinvertebrates were sampled at this site
benthic macroinvertebrates were not sampled at this site

attr.attrdef: were freshwater mussels (Unionidae) sampled at this site?

edom.edomvd: freshwater mussels (Unionidae) were sampled at this site
freshwater mussels (Unionidae) were not sampled at this site

attr.attrdef: Were stream habitat metrics sampled at this site?

edom.edomvd: stream habitat metrics were sampled at this site
stream habitat metrics were not sampled at this site

attr.attrdef: Was water chemistry sampled at this site?

edom.edomvd: water chemistry was sampled at this site
water chemistry was not sampled at this site

attr.attrdef: Were descriptive stream characteristics sampled at this site?

edom.edomvd: descriptive stream characteristics were sampled at this site
descriptive stream characteristics were not sampled at this site

attr.attrdef: The level of dataprotection to be applied to this sites and all records referencing this site.

edom.edomvd: Unrestricted datasource, no blocking of data.
Restricted datasource; all records and spatial information should be blocked in any publicly accessible version of the PAD.
Site contains species of special concern and thus locational information should be blocked in any publicly accessible versions of the PAD.
Unknown data restriction level, thus all records should be blocked until a new restriction level is confirmed by the data source.

overview.dsoverv: This dataset is a full listing of all of the sites with spatial information that were entered into the Pennsylvania Aquatic Database at the time of completion of Phase I of the Pennsylvania Aquatic Community Classification project. All of these sites originated from a diverse and extensive list of data providers throughout Pennsylvania and neighboring states.
overview.eaover: Attributes include what characteristics were sampled for at each site.
